item.description: 1function deployObject(obj) { 2 if (typeof obj == 'object') { 3 let res = {}; 4 Object.keys(obj).forEach(key => { 5 let value = obj[key] 6 if (value instanceof Array) { 7 value.forEach((item, index) => { 8 res[key + `.${index}`] = item; 9 }) 10 } 11 else { 12 res[key] = obj[key]; 13 } 14 }) 15 Object.keys(res).forEach(key => { 16 let value = res[key]; 17 if (typeof value == 'object') { 18 let subObj = deployObject(value); 19 Object.keys(subObj).forEach(subKey => { 20 res[key + `.${subKey}`] = subObj[subKey]; 21 delete res[key]; 22 }) 23 } 24 }) 25 return res; 26
